ComicInfo.Penciller: George Pratt,Mark Nelson,Mark A. Nelson,Mark A. Nelson,George Pratt
ComicInfo.Summary: Kal's having a tough time of it. He's traveling around the country trying to meet a woman . . . well, okay, women . . . who would be willing to bear his children. Like any other red-blooded male, he has a genetic need to expand his family tree. But finding the right woman . . . well, okay, women . . . isn't that simple. Because Kal isn't red-blooded. He's a human/alien hybrid, a unique, original Species. And he hasn't found a woman yet who is strong enough to carry his child.
ComicInfo.Title: Species: Human Race
